General.Name: Chengdu Guibao Science Tech
General.Description: Chengdu Guibao Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of organic silicone sealants and treasures and other new materials in the People's Republic of China. It offers curtain wall, insulating glass, windows and doors, interior decoration products; industrial chimney anticorrosion, sewage pool anticorrosion, and anticorrosion of power equipment and facilities products; solar cell modules and electronic heat conduction potting glue; civil products; headlight and engine seals and car interior products for cars; prefabricated building products; silicon for concrete building joints; sealants, potting glue, heat-resistant silicone, silicone adhesives, potting compound, thermal grease, and thermally conductive fillers for electronic appliances; and speed rail track caulking seal. Chengdu Guibao Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.
